Name: Secreted Proteins Via GO Annotation And WoLF PSORT For shCTSB Paper
Tools:
tp_easyjoin_tool, Removes comment lines at the head of the Uniprot Go database file.
Grep1, wolf_psort, GO:0043230 "extracellular organelle"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
get_subontology_from, tp_sorted_uniq, Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside extracellularly.
Filter1, Extracts uniprot accessions from all proteins in the input list that are predicted by WolfPsort to be lysosomal and/or extracellular.
Convert characters1, GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
term_id_vs_term_name, tp_cut_tool, GO:0005764 "lysosome"
term_id_vs_term_name, uniprot, GO:0009986 "cell surface"
get_subontology_from, GO:0009986 "cell surface"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
term_id_vs_term_name, filters out all proteins in the input protein list of interest that are annotated as "extracellular region" and "lysosome" and "plasma membrane" excluding "extracellular organelle" and "cytoplasmic side of plasma membrane"
comp1, GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
get_subontology_from, GO:0043230 "extracellular organelle"
get_subontology_from, Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside in lysosomes.
Filter1, bg_uniq, GO:0005764 "lysosome"
get_subontology_from
